frontmatter.title: Inversive Geometry
frontmatter.metaDesc: This is a simple React.js app that demonstrates the inversive geometry of a point in a circle.

frontmatter.title: Markov Chain Text Generator
frontmatter.metaDesc: Text generator written in React.js that uses Markov chains to generate text based on a given input.

frontmatter.title: Pipe Thickness Calculator
frontmatter.metaDesc: Application for calculating pipe thickness based on material properties and exporting calculations into a word document.

frontmatter.title: Molecule Energy Estimator
frontmatter.metaDesc: Machine learning algorithm that can predict the energy of a molecule based on its three-dimensional representation (conformation).

frontmatter.title: Data Science Bootcamp
frontmatter.metaDesc: Collection of final projects from data science bootcamp from Yandex Practicum.

frontmatter.title: Felony Felines
frontmatter.metaDesc: Felony Felines is a local multiplayer top-down wave-based survival shooter in which 2 players fight an endless army of robots in the spirit of Box Head: 2-Play

frontmatter.title: Anime RecSys
frontmatter.metaDesc: Development and comparison of user-item recommendation systems in TensorFlow on an anime dataset.

frontmatter.title: Amazon description generator
frontmatter.metaDesc: A proof of concept, Amazon product description generator using GPT-Neo for Texta.ai

frontmatter.title: Kamernet Puppeteer
frontmatter.metaDesc: Automatic message sender to new adverts on Kamernet using puppeteer.

frontmatter.title: Soft Skills AI
frontmatter.metaDesc: Telegram bot that simulates work situations to help HR select people for support. It generates text scenarios using GPT-3 from OpenAI.

frontmatter.title: Orama Visual Assistant
frontmatter.metaDesc: Orama Visual Assistant is an app for visually impaired people that announces objects detected using user's phone camera.

frontmatter.title: LaTeXGen
frontmatter.metaDesc: Webapp that allows creation of self-generating mathematical problems in LaTeX and markdown languages using JavaScript.
